Stat.Name: Life
Stat.Description: If this value reaches zero, the associated character dies.

Stat.Name: Armor
Stat.Description: Divide damage taken by this value.

Stat.Name: Free Armor
Stat.Description: Reduce damage taken by this amount.

Stat.Name: Move Speed
Stat.Description: Character move speed in units per second.

Stat.Name: Jump Speed
Stat.Description: Speed at the start of a jump in units per second.

Stat.Name: Midair Reverse Speed
Stat.Description: Horizontal speed in midair if the character reverses direction in midair.

Stat.Name: Attack Speed
Stat.Description: Base attack speed. Do not use this for characters with attacks that depend on animation triggers.
